channel.title: How can I run an RSPS on mac?
channel.description: I've tried numerous times but when following tutorials I'm always left confused as there are always problems. Is there any tutorials that aren't outdated (FOR MAC), if not can someone take me through it step by step? thanks.

item.title: How can I run an RSPS on mac?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

At least have the decency to put them int a folder on the C drive Clutter my shit up against my will, that’d piss me off.

Read full topic

Someone should tell them how to make a config file, so users can configure stuff like that themselves.

item.title: How can I run an RSPS on mac?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Zymus, post:13, topic:551247”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670162.msg4481394#msg4481394 date=1430163003]
Didn’t most RSPS’s save the cache to the C:\ drive?
Last I recall Mac doesn’t have a C:\ by default.

Also: Windows isn’t case sensitive where Mac is. So some stuff may be named inappropriately in the client/server…
[/quote]

I thought that most servers were using user.home?[/quote]
You’d think that. You really would. But nope:

There’s 4 of em in my c drive now, not counting the many I’ve deleted.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I run an RSPS on mac?

rsps is not platform independent

Wat

item.title: How can I run an RSPS on mac?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:5, topic:551247”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=670162.msg4481311#msg4481311 date=1430076631]
Okay download virtual box and get windows on it. Then follow a windows tutorial on how to run a server! ;D :palm: :eek:
[/quote]No wonder you tools don’t mind writing/using shitty source… You use practices that are inherently crappy on resources anyways.[/quote]
Not even, I’ve seen some programs that are platform independent even though they’re written in Java. The only approach would be to use a supportive operating system.
Ofc in this example such measures are not needed nor is it practical since rsps is not platform independent furthermore I’d recommend you read a book on how to spot sarcasm.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I run an RSPS on mac?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“iSarah, post:1, topic:551247”]I’ve tried numerous times but when following tutorials I’m always left confused as there are always problems.
Is there any tutorials that aren’t outdated (FOR MAC), if not can someone take me through it step by step? thanks.[/quote]

It’s Java.
Java is multi-platform.
It’s the same on windows or mac.
The only thing you need to do is (possibly) fix the classpath.
There are tutorials to do that.

Read full topic
